titles.title: Bovine Growth Hormone User Assessment Act

A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to reduce the price received by producers for milk that is produced by cows injected with bovine growth hormone, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4323-4326)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Bovine Growth Hormone User Assessment Act - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to reduce the price received for milk produced by cows injected with bovine growth hormone.
